badged_color_label.description: This string is used as name for the badged color label.

check_os_log.description: This string is used on ClearURLs log startup.

cleaning_tool_btn.description: This string is used as name for the clean url button.

cleaning_tool_clean_urls_label.description: This string is used as title on the cleaning tool page for the clean URLs.

cleaning_tool_description.description: This string is used as description of the cleaning tool.
cleaning_tool_description.message: Az ide beillesztett URL-eket megtisztíthatod a ClearURLs segítségével, ha a zöld gombra nyomsz. Egyszerre több URL-t is megadhatsz, de a címeket soronként kell beírnod.

cleaning_tool_dirty_urls_label.description: This string is used as title on the cleaning tool page for the dirty URLs.

cleaning_tool_page_title.description: This string is used as title on the cleaning tool page.

clipboard_copy_link.description: This string is used in the context menu to copy clean links.

configs_switch_statistics.description: This string is used as name for the statistics switch button on the popup page.

configs_switch_statistics_title.description: This string is used as title for the statistics switch button on the popup page.

context_menu_enabled.description: This string is used toggle the context menu entry to copy clean links.

core_error.description: This string is used to tell the user, that ClearURLs could not be started.

core_save_on_disk.description: This string is used to tell the user, that ClearURLs saved the settings on disk.

donate_button.description: This string is used to refer to a donation page.

hash_status_code_1.description: This status code says, that no update is available for the ClearURLs rules and everything is up to date.

hash_status_code_2.description: This status code says, that the ClearURLs rules are successfully updated.

hash_status_code_3.description: This status code says, that an update is available for the ClearURLs rules.

hash_status_code_4.description: This status code says, that the ClearURLs could not be started correctly.

hash_status_code_5.description: This status code says, that an error occurred while updating the ClearURLs rules.

log_domain_blocked.description: This string is used on blocked domains in the ClearURLs log.

log_html_page_title.description: This string is used as header on the log page.

log_html_reset_button.description: This string is used for the reset button on the log page.

log_html_reset_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the reset button on the log page.

log_html_table_head_1.description: This string is used as table title on the log page.

log_html_table_head_2.description: This string is used as table title on the log page.

log_html_table_head_3.description: This string is used as table title on the log page.

log_html_table_head_4.description: This string is used as table title on the log page.

log_redirect.description: This string is used on redirections in the ClearURLs log.

popup_html_configs_head.description: This string is used as title for the configs on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_badges.description: This string is used as name for the badges switch button on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_badges_title.description: This string is used as title for the badges switch button on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_filter.description: This string is used as name for the filter switch button on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_filter_title.description: This string is used as title for the filter switch button on the popup page.
popup_html_configs_switch_filter_title.message: A Szűrők kapcsoló aktiválja a ClearURLs tisztítás funkcióját. Ha kikapcsolod, akkor az egész bővítmény működése leáll.

popup_html_configs_switch_log.description: This string is used as name for the logging switch button on the popup page.

popup_html_configs_switch_log_title.description: This string is used as title for the logging switch button on the popup page.
popup_html_configs_switch_log_title.message: A napló helyileg lesz elmentve. Ha nincs rá szükséged inkább ne kapcsold be.

popup_html_log_head.description: This string is used as name for the log button on the popup page.

popup_html_log_head_title.description: This string is used as title for the log button on the popup page.

popup_html_rules_status_head.description: This string is used as title for the rules-status section on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_blocked.description: This string is used as name for the blocked elements on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_elements.description: This string is used as name for the elements on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_head.description: This string is used as title for the statistics on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_percentage.description: This string is used as name for the percentage of blocked elements on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_reset_button.description: This string is used as name for the statistics reset button on the popup page.

popup_html_statistics_reset_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the statistics reset button on the popup page.

setting_hash_url_label.description: This string is used as name for the rule.hash url label.

setting_html_reset_button.description: This string is used as name for the reset button on the settings page.

setting_html_reset_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the reset button on the settings page.

setting_rule_url_label.description: This string is used as name for the rule url label.

setting_types_label.description: This string is used as name for the types label.

settings_html_page_title.description: This string is used as title on the settings page.

settings_html_save_button.description: This string is used as name for the save&reload button on the settings page.

settings_html_save_button_title.description: This string is used as title for the save&reload button on the settings page.
